 class CRFTrainerByLabelLikelihood

Uses of TransducerTrainer.ByOptimization in cc.mallet.fst.semi_supervised
 

Classes in cc.mallet.fst.semi_supervised that implement TransducerTrainer.ByOptimization
 class CRFTrainerByEntropyRegularization
          A CRF trainer that maximizes the log-likelihood plus a weighted entropy regularization term on unlabeled data.
